tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PowerGridData (
    power_line_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    power_line_location GEOGRAPHY,
    power_line_status TEXT,
    substation_id UUID,
    substation_location GEOGRAPHY
)

CREATE TABLE power_lines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    line_name VARCHAR(50),
    location GEOMETRY,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE substations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    substation_name VARCHAR(50),
    location GEOMETRY,
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    line_id INT,
    substation_id INT,
    voltage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PowerLines (
  line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  line_name VARCHAR(255),
  line_length FLOAT,
  line_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Substations (
  station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(255),
  location GEOMETRY,
  station_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE PowerLineStatus (
  status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  line_id INT,
  status_time TIMESTAMP,
  status_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GeospatialData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location GEOMETRY,
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE power_lines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE substations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE power_line_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    power_line_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE substation_status (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    substation_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)
